tracks.name: Infinitum
tracks.recording_license: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License.
tracks.notes: A more theory-heavy composition with an active bassline, unrelenting piano melody, and multiple harmonic modulations.

tracks.name: Voyage's End
